00030 template<class D, class T> class ckType
00031 {
00032 public:
00036     ckType()
00037     {
00038         m_type = 0;
00039     }
00040 
00045     ckType(T type)
00046     {
00047         m_type = static_cast<D>(type);
00048     }
00049 
00055     ckType<D, T>& operator=(T type)
00056     {
00057         m_type = static_cast<D>(type);
00058 
00059         return *this;
00060     }
00061 
00067     bool operator==(ckType<D, T> type) const
00068     {
00069         return (getType() == type.getType());
00070     }
00071 
00077     bool operator==(T type) const
00078     {
00079         return (getType() == type);
00080     }
00081 
00088     friend bool operator==(T type1, ckType<D, T> type2)
00089     {
00090         return (type1 == type2.getType());
00091     }
00092 
00098     bool operator!=(ckType<D, T> type) const
00099     {
00100         return (getType() != type.getType());
00101     }
00102 
00108     bool operator!=(T type) const
00109     {
00110         return (getType() != type);
00111     }
00112 
00119     friend bool operator!=(T type1, ckType<D, T> type2)
00120     {
00121         return (type1 != type2.getType());
00122     }
00123 
00128     T getType() const
00129     {
00130         return static_cast<T>(m_type);
00131     }
00132 
00137     D getValue() const
00138     {
00139         return m_type;
00140     }
00141 
00142 private:
00143     D m_type;
00144 };

00148 template<class D> class ckType<D, bool>
00149 {
00150 public:
00151     ckType()
00152     {
00153         m_type = 0;
00154     }
00155 
00156     ckType(bool type)
00157     {
00158         m_type = static_cast<D>(type);
00159     }
00160

00162     {
00163         m_type = static_cast<D>(type);
00164 
00165         return *this;
00166     }
00167 
00168     bool operator==(ckType<D, bool> type) const
00169     {
00170         return (getType() == type.getType());
00171     }
00172 
00173     bool operator==(bool type) const
00174     {
00175         return (getType() == type);
00176     }
00177 
00178     friend bool operator==(bool type1, ckType<D, bool> type2)
00179     {
00180         return (type1 == type2.getType());
00181     }
00182 
00183     bool operator!=(ckType<D, bool> type) const
00184     {
00185         return (getType() != type.getType());
00186     }
00187 
00188     bool operator!=(bool type) const
00189     {
00190         return (getType() != type);
00191     }
00192 
00193     friend bool operator!=(bool type1, ckType<D, bool> type2)
00194     {
00195         return (type1 != type2.getType());
00196     }
00197 
00198     bool getType() const
00199     {
00200         return m_type ? true : false;
00201     }
00202 
00203     D getValue() const
00204     {
00205         return m_type;
00206     }
